sentences.sContent: As well as working on more Hindi films, Hollywood beckons, if only for a new experience.
sentences.sContent_eng: As well as working on more Hindi films, Hollywood beckons, if only for a new experience.
sentences.sCn: 同样 会为更多的北印度电影配乐，好莱坞也在向他招手——哪怕只是为了有一种新体验。

sentences.sContent: Sexuality and divinity are very closely entwined in the Hindi faith.Religion is closely linked to sexuality and beauty.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sexuality and divinity are very closely entwined in the Hindi faith.Religion is closely linked to sexuality and beauty.
sentences.sCn: 在北印度人的信念中，性欲与神性紧密地联系在一起，宗教与性欲和美息息相关。

sentences.sContent: For the examples in this article, you can use any Smart Common Input Method platform (SCIM) software to transliterate the English characters to Hindi.
sentences.sContent_eng: For the examples in this article, you can use any Smart Common Input Method platform (SCIM) software to transliterate the English characters to Hindi.
sentences.sCn: 例如，在本文中，您可以使用任何智能的通用输入法平台 (SCIM) 软件将英文字符音译为北印度语。
